title: can some one help me please with patch
body: i have tried everything and it just gets stuck at 32% (3.73mb)********

replies.body:
Uninstall League off of your computer, and then remove the "Riot Games" folder off of your hard-drive. Reinstall League with default settings.

Be sure to back up your configurations before uninstalling, if you want to save some time.

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752904-Item-Sets-#h4
